column3:
This is a massive diff, the rendered markdown difference is empty and the travis linter doesn't pass. Slightly tend toward NACK, as it is not worth reviewing.

If you want to contribute to Bitcoin Core, refer to the following section.

## Getting started to contribute to Bitcoin Core

### Setting up your development environment

New developers are very welcome and needed. There are

Diff is big only because of formatting lists.\nRendered markdown is not changed (except for comma) as intended. This is only formatting fix, not contents change.\nI have no idea why travis failing, log shows some odd stuff, not related to document itself.
> I have no idea why travis failing, log shows some odd stuff, not related to document itself.\n\n`test/lint/lint-whitespace.sh` -- trailing spaces?

Tend to NACK, this is style change noise for no visible change per [this markdown preview](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20086/files?short_path=6a33714#diff-6a3371457528722a734f3c51d9238c13) except for one single comma, and of all the places one could change a comma in the prose, it's not necessarily the only or optimal one.
> Help with review and testing... review on any open pull request is welcome. Review will also help you understand the codebase better.\n\nThis is a great suggestion for how to contribute.
@hebasto fixed. IDK how it get there, had no errors when copy/paste from editor.
NACK, this is not worth doing IMO. We use the level 1 and level 2 headers as underlines everywhere, I don't see the reason to change this.

> @hebasto no trailing spaces there.

```
$ test/lint/lint-whitespace.sh 
This diff appears to have added new lines with trailing whitespace.
The following changes were suspected:
```
